name: FreeAdvice
0:
”Alexa, ask Free Advice to give user name some advice”
”Alexa, start free advice”
”Alexa, launch free advice”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: free advice
des:
Unasked for advice is seldom welcome. 
With the Free Advice skill, you choose to ask for the advice.
It's personalized. And it's FREE!!!
Just say Alexa, ask Free Advice to give (any name) advice.

This skill was built with love by VoiceApps.com. Visit us to create your own skill in minutes!
